Headline: No trains between Harlem and Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Clark/Lake and Harlem Terminal due to fire department activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Clark/Lake and Harlem Terminal due to fire department activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between 63rd/Ashland/Cottage Grove and Clark/Lake at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Clark/Lake and Harlem terminal to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
